"Cosas que le confio a los Dragones":
"I want to search for more fragments
left behind by the famous swordsmith,
Zieg. According to my intel, I have to
go to Amduscia's floating continent.

Dragonkin await, and they don't like
trespassers. But if we're careful...

――――――――――――――――――――
Fracaso: Retirarse despues de ser incapacitado"
